name: The Tale of Village
description:
The Tale of Village is a real time survival/strategy hex-based game with a procedurally generated two-dimensional world. The game does not have a strict final aim. You can play however you want - you can build villages, explore the world, make a big army etc. The game has the possibility to create as many saved games as you want, so you can go back to your already built village or share the world with your friends! The core gameplay is based on commonly known rules of popular real-time strategies like "Cultures", "Settlers" or "Knights and Merchants".

This game was initially released on 01 Apr 2022 on this GitHub page.

Game soundtrack was composed by Bluu.
Gameplay was tested by kubaw208.

[Some graphics used in the game are from publicly available Google Images.]
[Some sounds used in the game are from publicly available YouTube videos.]
